modName: Hold Capital Symbol Vectors - SVG and High-Res PNG
summary: High quality, high-res Skyrim hold capital symbols anyone can use in their work.
descriptionHtml:
[img]http://i.imgur.com/wwxjJoJ.png[/img]

[font=Lucida Sans Unicode][b][size=4]Description[/size][/b][/font]

[font=Lucida Sans Unicode][size=3]Making promotional material for your mod or simply need high quality Skyrim hold emblems (the ones found on the guard shields) for a graphic? Twist it, turn it, change the color. I look forward to seeing what you make.[/size][/font]

[font=Lucida Sans Unicode][size=3]Two versions are provided here: a .svg version, and a .png version. The .svg file is the vectorized version that you have to use a graphics editor to open, and you can resize to your needs. The .png file is the regular bitmap version for people who donâ€™t have access to or are not used to using a graphics editor. The .png file is upwards of 10080 pixels on a given side depending on the emblem, so it should be large enough for just about any project and can be downscaled to your needs.[/size][/font]

[font=Lucida Sans Unicode][size=3][b]Included: [/b]Dawnstar, Falkreath, Markarth, Morthal, Riften, Solitude, Whiterun, Windhelm, Winterhold.[/size][/font]

[font=Lucida Sans Unicode][b][size=4]Usage[/size][/b][/font]

[font=Lucida Sans Unicode][size=3]After you've downloaded the file, use a graphics editor like Adobe Illustrator, CorelDRAW, or Inkscape to open the .svg file. For the .png version, you can use a graphics editor or an image editor like Adobe Photoshop, GIMP, or Paint.NET.[/size][/font]

[font=Lucida Sans Unicode][b][size=4]Permissions[/size][/b][/font]

[font=Lucida Sans Unicode][size=3]Feel free to use these graphics in your work. You don't have to credit me, but it would be nice if you did nonetheless. However, if you have any ideas on how to improve them, please let me know before you distribute them yourself. If you want to upload this Artist's Resource elsewhere, besides Nexus, make sure you credit me as its original author and provide a link back to this mod page.[/size][/font]

[font=Lucida Sans Unicode][b][size=4]Consider checking out my other files[/size][/b][/font]

[center][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/64439][img]http://i.imgur.com/mh1K6B7.png[/img][/url] [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/68054][img]http://i.imgur.com/jKs5SHe.png[/img][/url][/center]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/uHx5b21.png[/img]
author: Polykobus

files.name: 1. Artist's Resource - Hold Capital Symbol Vectors - SVG
files.fileName: 1. Artist's Resource - Hold Capital Symbol Vectors - SVG-68479-1-9.7z
files.changelogHtml:
- Added a white background to every vector.
- Added a grey background to every vector so that the white background of the vectors are visible.
- Changed the shade of blue of the vectors' outline to increase visibility and contrast.
- A version of each vector with or without a background is now included in the PNG archive.
- Removed the custom shapes file because it is no longer up to date.
